body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information. As part of the conversation, the customer should ask two questions.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should cover two or three topics, have back and forth between the parties, and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Cafe Delight customer support. My name is Jeremy Stewart. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Amy. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I have some concerns about privacy at your cafe. How secure is my personal information?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: We take privacy very seriously. We have robust security measures in place to protect customer data. Could you provide me with your email address and phone number for further assistance?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my email is amypowell@example.com and my phone number is five five five one two three four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Amy. Is there anything else you would like to know about our privacy policies or any other concerns you have?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, what steps do you take to ensure the confidentiality of my payment information? And how often do you update your privacy policy?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: We use encrypted payment gateways to secure your payment details, and our privacy policy is updated annually to comply with regulations. Thank you for bringing up these important points, Amy.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I appreciate your time and concerns, Amy. Thank you for reaching out to us with your questions. Have a great day!

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, Jeremy. You've been very helpful. Goodbye!
